description: This file declares the interface for DobbyContainer management within the WPEFramework plugin. It includes class declarations, method signatures for container lifecycle operations, and event handling related to container state changes.

classes.name: DobbyInterface
classes.description: A class that provides an interface to manage Dobby containers, including starting, stopping, pausing, resuming, and querying container states. It also handles container events.

methods.name: initialize
methods.description: Initializes the DobbyInterface with an event handler.

methods.name: terminate
methods.description: Terminates the DobbyInterface, cleaning up resources.

methods.name: listContainers
methods.description: Lists all running containers.

methods.name: getContainerInfo
methods.description: Retrieves detailed information of a specific container.

methods.name: getContainerState
methods.description: Gets the current state of a container.

methods.name: startContainer
methods.description: Starts a container with specified parameters.

methods.name: startContainerFromDobbySpec
methods.description: Starts a container from a Dobby specification.

methods.name: stopContainer
methods.description: Stops a running container.

methods.name: pauseContainer
methods.description: Pauses a running container.

methods.name: resumeContainer
methods.description: Resumes a paused container.

methods.name: hibernateContainer
methods.description: Hibernates a container with specified options.

methods.name: wakeupContainer
methods.description: Wakes up a hibernated container.

methods.name: executeCommand
methods.description: Executes a command in a running container.

methods.name: annotate
methods.description: Adds an annotation key-value pair to a container.

methods.name: removeAnnotation
methods.description: Removes an annotation from a container.

methods.name: mount
methods.description: Mounts a filesystem source into a container.

methods.name: unmount
methods.description: Unmounts a filesystem target from a container.

methods.name: onContainerStarted
methods.description: Callback invoked when a container starts.

methods.name: onContainerStopped
methods.description: Callback invoked when a container stops.

methods.name: onContainerStateChanged
methods.description: Callback invoked when the container state changes.

methods.name: onVerityFailed
methods.description: Callback invoked when verity check fails for a container.

ctags.name: mEventListenerId
ctags.pattern: /^            int mEventListenerId; \/\/ Dobby event listener ID$/
